This Pull Request is related to or fixes issue # .

Explain the **details** for making this change. What existing problem does the pull request solve?

## Steps to Test Changes and/or Reproduce Issue
Outline the steps to test or reproduce the PR here. If this PR is to fix an
existing bug, please lay out the steps that will reproduce the bug you encountered.

## Testing
In order for us to merge this pull request, all of the following have had to been completed and/or succeeded:

- [ ] This change worked locally after running `npm run local`
- [ ] Added additional unit tests (*if adding any new functionality*)
- [ ] Added additional E2E tests (*if adding any new or updating existing UI functionality*)
- [ ] Ran `npm run test:unit`
- [ ] Ran `npm run test:e2e`
- [ ] Ran `npm run copyrightLicenseCheck`
- [ ] Ran `npm run checkCIConfig`
- [ ] Ran `npm run codeclimateAnalyze`

## Code Formatting
Make sure to have ran `npm run lint` against your new changes in order to make sure you are following
our coding guidelines.

## Auto Closing Issues

Put `closes #XX` in your comment to auto-close the issue that your PR fixes (if such).
